attributes.action: Knighthoods for Kevin Sinfieid & Rob Burrows
attributes.additional_details: Give proper recognition when it's warranted
attributes.background: Acknowledge these two for the work and fundraising of MND awareness

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
